Package space.sunqian.common.object.data.handlers

Class AbstractObjectSchemaHandler

java.lang.Object
space.sunqian.common.object.data.handlers.AbstractObjectSchemaHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectSchemaParser.Handler
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleBeanSchemaHandler
public abstract class AbstractObjectSchemaHandler extends Object implements ObjectSchemaParser.Handler
This is a skeletal implementation of the ObjectSchemaParser.Handler to minimize the effort required to implement the interface.

This class uses Class.getMethods() to find out all methods (the synthetic method will be filtered out), then passes each of them to resolveAccessor(Method) to resolve property accessor infos. This class will perform subsequent parsing based on those property accessor infos, the subclasses only needs to implement the resolveAccessor(Method).

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public boolean parse(@Nonnull ObjectSchemaParser.Context context) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: ObjectSchemaParser.Handler
      Parses Type to ObjectSchema with its owner parsing logic. The Type is specified by ObjectSchemaParser.Context.dataType() of the given context, and the parsed properties should be stored in ObjectSchemaParser.Context.propertyBaseMap(). Returns false to prevent subsequent handlers to continue to parse, otherwise returns true.
      Specified by:
      parse in interface ObjectSchemaParser.Handler
      Parameters:
      context - the given context
      Returns:
      whether to continue to parse
      Throws:
      Exception - for errors during parsing

    • resolveAccessor

      @Nullable protected abstract @Nullable AbstractObjectSchemaHandler.AccessorInfo resolveAccessor(@Nonnull @Nonnull Method method)
      Resolves and returns the given method to an accessor info, or null if the given method is not a data property.
      Parameters:
      method - the given method
      Returns:
      the accessor info resolved from the given method, or null if the given method is not a data property
